items.title:
How the number of electors went up

The deletion of 65 lakh electors from Bihar’s draft electoral rolls has kicked up a row nationwide. In Tamil Nadu, the decline in the size of the electorate lasted between 1999 and 2009. In fact, in 2009, when the State faced the Lok Sabha election, close to 50 
lakh names were dropped from the roll

items.title: Two women, youth held for ‘murdering’ moneylender in Prakasam district
items.summary: With the woman moneylender pestering the accused to clear the loans, they smothered her to death and fled with valuables worth ₹3 lakh from the house, say police

Children to be offered chickenpox vaccine on NHS
items.summary: All young children in England and Wales will be offered a free chickenpox vaccine by the NHS from January 2026.
